# Welcome to my Blog

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

## Plot
g <- ggplot(mpg, aes(cty))
g + geom_density(aes(fill=factor(cyl)), alpha=0.8) + 
    labs(title="Density plot", 
         subtitle="City Mileage Grouped by Number of cylinders",
         caption="Source: mpg", x="City Mileage",
         fill="# Cylinders")
```
